artist: Artist: Seth Tobocman , et al.; Author: Chris Flash , et al.; Publisher: SHADOW Press, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, photographic image of President Obama in front of fleet of drones, with text and designs, printed in offset lithography on newsprint; 19 pp.
medium: Offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: The Shadow, no. 53: It's OUR time for a REAL Change!!
